content.raw:
Are these changes strictly for getting the test to work during a semi-supervised mode? Or does this error always occur if identify is run in semi-supervised mode?

Am I mistaken that existing tests already account for this? For example:
```
test/data/touchstone/traindir/auxiliary/segway.inc
53:#ifndef CARD_SUPERVISIONLABEL
54:#define CARD_SUPERVISIONLABEL -1
```
content.html:
Are these changes strictly for getting the test to work during a semi-supervised mode? Or does this error always occur if identify is run in semi-supervised mode?

Am I mistaken that existing tests already account for this? For example:

test/data/touchstone/traindir/auxiliary/segway.inc

54:#define CARD_SUPERVISIONLABEL -1
